input_args.passage: 'Elie Wiesel – Biographical - NobelPrize.org | Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he teaches “Literature of Memory.” Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council from ...'
input_args.claim: 'From, we see that Elie Wiesel is a Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University, where he teaches “Literature of Memory.” He was also the Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
